name: Amazon DynamoDB
short: A NoSQL database service on AWS that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability.
description: Amazon DynamoDB is a NoSQL database service provided by AWS, offering fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability. It's designed to handle large scale, low latency, read and write workloads. It supports both key-value and document data models. DynamoDB is fully managed, eliminating administrative burdens like hardware provisioning, setup, configuration, and backups. Data is stored on SSDs and replicated across 3 different zones, ensuring high availability and durability. It also integrates with AWS Lambda for triggers.
